cab.content: SECRETCP.(56) 254 COPY NO1 st November, 1956CABINET.4iOPERATIONS AGAINST EGYPTNote by the Secretary of the cabinet a daily situation report is being prepared in the Ministry ofDefence Information Room for circulation to members of the Cabinet,the three Service Ministers and the Minister of Transport. These reportswill normally be circulated on the 8. 00 a. m. Cabinet distribution. Theyare for the personal information of the Minister concerned.2. A War Room has been established in the basement of theMinistry of Defence (Room No. 67) where maps and plots of operationscan be seen. Members of the Cabinet, the Service Ministers and theMinister of Transport will be admitted at any time. Ministers should,however, be warned that they may be asked to show evidence of identification to the security guards.(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office, S.W.1.1st November, 1956
